casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marcus Dawnte GODWIN. No. 489P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, for Godwin. Susan Doyle, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ____, 666 S.E.2d 890.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of December 2008 by State of NC to Deem State's Motion to Dismiss Appeal and Response to Petition Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
